data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Provides common set of methods bindings for Stripe API. Since
    Stripe was recently release and the set of APIs may change, instead
    of providing a comprehensive set of bindings of all available
    functions, a reduced set of commonly used methods and a special
    general method that can be used with any API current and future
    function calls.
